I cannot see how it would help in studies ? To say "in the style of X" 
would never work as it is just speculation, and many artists worked in 
multiple styles. It may say that it was made by this school in the style 
of that school, but that would not help identify the work any easier 
would it ?. Just that it looks like something that school made.  Also, 
the submitter could just do this himself no ?

Rich
